questions.quote: Let me ask you a question. This, uh, this turkey sandwich here, is that real turkey, or is it a turkey roll? I don't want that processed turkey.  I hate it.
Oh, no no. Tuesday's uh no good becasue we've got choir practice.

This food ,it has no taste......nothin' I'm gettin' nothin'... It must be the toxic gas from the fumigation......

Well, you know Elaine, sometimes you say things just to be nice.
No, I'm not gonna tell her about your shrinkage. Besides, I think women know about shrinkage.
